title: Sci-Fi Interface Sound Effects
description: A package with many varieties of sci-fi interface sounds, including 154 sound effects of working and interacting with futuristic interfaces and devices. Great for activation, buttons, power-on, launch, lockout and other sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/sci-fi-interface-sounds

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/7db5anqn9fvcvmo/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Interface%20Sounds.pdf?dl=0


The collection contains 154 working and interacting sound effects of sci-fi interfaces, including:

  • 24 activation sounds
  • 16 sounds of airlock
  • 20 ui and button sounds
  • 10 sounds of deactivation
  • 10 launch sounds
  • 20 lockout sounds
  • 10 shift sounds
  • 24 shutdown sounds
  • 20 working sounds of interfaces


Sounds are great for use in futuristic games for opening and closing futuristic doors of starships, spaceships, stations and bases; movement of robots; device buttons; activating, deactivating and locking interfaces; background atmospheric sounds of space stations and ships, control rooms with devices.


Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 154 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 9 types of sci-fi interface sound effects in total
  • many variations of interface sounds
  • perfect for animations, trailers, game scenes of various genres


Number of Audio Waves: 154

Number of Audio Cues: 154

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 11 minutes 25 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
